name: bnj1517
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(w1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wa(w1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wa(w1, w0)))

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
